name: Eerie Dearies Special Edition
description:
This is the Special edition which is a SIGNED and numbered copy that includes a bunch of goodies: a postcard, mini-print and stickers AND an original, signed piece of art - a small drawing : ) 

This book is a beautiful hardcover, with golden and silver embossing on the cover with a textured spine.
 
Book Size:  8.75" x 11",  64 pages

  Astral projection, gremlin-attacks, and teleportation are just a few of the reasons for academic absence creatively illustrated in this book.

   EERIE DEARIES is an unusual book that offers a carefully crafted & alphabetized selection of twenty-six beautifully illustrated excuses for being absent from school. Faded and well-used book covers serve as compelling backgrounds to each of these delicately rendered acrylic paintings, creating an atmosphere akin to an old and dusty collection of darkly humourous myths.

Shipping overseas may take up to 8 wks for delivery, with no tracking and no delivery guarantee. If you would like a quote for shipping by air with a tracking number please email me at rebeccachaperon@gmail.com.

name: Eerie Dearies (REGULAR edition)
description:
This book is signed by the author.

This book is a beautiful hardcover, with golden and silver embossing on the cover with a textured spine.

Book Size:  8.75" x 11",  64 pages

  Astral projection, gremlin-attacks, and teleportation are just a few of the reasons for academic absence creatively illustrated in this book.

   EERIE DEARIES is an unusual book that offers a carefully crafted & alphabetized selection of twenty-six beautifully illustrated excuses for being absent from school. Faded and well-used book covers serve as compelling backgrounds to each of these delicately rendered acrylic paintings, creating an atmosphere akin to an old and dusty collection of darkly humourous myths.

   This bizarre and astonishing ABC book contains 26 illustrations of absent school girls in ephemeral landscapes. These intriguing figures are at once pale and wan and amusingly dramatic. The perfect peculiar ABC!

*Shipping overseas may take up to 8 wks for delivery, with no tracking and no delivery guarantee. If you would like a quote for shipping by air with a tracking number please email me at rebeccachaperon@gmail.com.

name: The High Road - Mini Iceberg #70

name: Monochrome Iceberg #4
description: #4 in my series of icebergs on paper. Each of the paintings in this series is an exploration devoid of colour that creates a minimal seascape where the iceberg is a lone figure.

options.name: Original Art Acrylic Paint on Paper 8" x 10" - $325.00

description: #3 in my series of the simple icebergs created on thick watercolour paper using acrylic paint.

options.name: Original artwork acrylic on paper 8" x 10" - $325.00

name: Pink Iceberg with Confetti
description: Under salmon-coloured skies this iceberg floats in a cluster of tiny bright geometric shapes.

name: Baby Berg
description: A baby iceberg nestled in a small waterway under the gaze of two palm trees.

name: Tropical Iceberg #2
description: A rapidly melting iceberg by a tropical shore.

name: Tropical Iceberg #1
description: This iceberg is situated in a tropical zone and rapidly melting.

name: Icebergs in Love
description: I'm catching feelings just looking at these two. Floating closely while romantic music plays, two icebergs embark on the universal journey of falling in love. I hear wedding bells.

name: Presence
description: An ominous void creates a shift in space and time.

name: Two Portals in Conversation
description: In this epic event we see two portals bow toward each other in conversation. It's rare for them to come across another of their kind. Now they will remain locked in conversation for 50 of our human years. To our ears, it is not a sound that they make but a sudden absence of sounds. For example, the soft winds that whip up the snow and ripple the water are muted to a low frequency drone.

name: Caught on a Wind from a Parallel Dimension
description: Imagine the sound of water lapping softly against the glacial obelisk while a rebellious stir of unidentified objects eddy around each other, as though caught on a wind from a parallel dimension.

name: Population
description: A grid of space dwellers populate a newly terra formed planet. These women seems to speak to each other about extraterrestrial gossip in hushed tones. it's hard to make out distinct words as they softly chatter on, all at the same time.

name: Astral Projection
description: Eat rainbow sorbet before you go to sleep and you'll be astral projecting in no time. Your boots kicking at tree tops and hair a-floating on a breeze.

name: Broken Heart
description: You could actually hear the sound of her heart snapping into two. It made a dull "tink", like the sound of dropping a small tin robot on a tile floor. It was utterly heart breaking.

name: Contagious
description: Psychedelic fever-dreams followed her through the night, only to be extinguished by the light of dawn and the sound of a gentle stream.

name: Ennui
description: There was nothing left to do but listen to her favourite Smiths album, over and over again.

name: Dumbstruck
description: Her mind furiously rifled through a list of possible things to say in this odd situation. The trees were of no help at all.

name: Fever
description: A quiet charisma formed a fierce aura around her, and the cold stare of dour critics could not rain on her parade.

name: Gremlins
description: Besieged at the breakfast table, just when she thought she had finally been rid of the furry little ghouls.

name: Hiding
description: She was beginning to wonder if the game of hide-and-seek had been abandoned, and, if the other girls had all forgotten her. The prospect didn't bother her much as she rather liked to be alone and found girls her age to be a bit silly sometimes.

name: Insomnia
description: As she tossed and turned in the hopes of getting but a wink of sleep, she became distinctly aware of a strange noise and a flashing light passed across her window pane. Giving up on sleep she decided to explore the source of this disturbance, determined that she would discover it no matter what the cost.

name: Juvenile Delinquent
description: Her father had knitted his black bushy eyebrows together, she would not get any allowance this week. "Well I'll fix his wagon!" she thought, as she looted his precious watch collection.

name: Kidnapped
description: Spirited away on an icy waterway, the landscape that swept away from her was becoming increasingly unfamiliar.

name: Lost
description: In the attempt to find a clue as to which direction she should take, an impending sense of doom began to push all rational thoughts away. She was left with the distinct impression that she was becoming transparent again.

name: Mono
description: She waited out her mononucleosis with a stoic spirit, making friends with forest animals and taking naps inside a hollow log.

name: Narcolepsy
description: Late nights had caught up with her and she had taken to falling asleep in the middle of conversations.

name: Observation
description: Her surrender came only after a long stalemate in the game of spy vs. spy. But extra credits for epic espionage were awarded to each side.

name: Pale
description: She woke as night fell and seemed to glide across the manor grounds toward the darkened woods beyond. No longer human, she had transformed into a  delicate variety of night creature whose violent thirst was at odds with her prim and proper attire.

name: Quarantine
description: Beyond the quarantine's perimeter the scientists took note of the strange effect she seemed to have on her surrounding landscape. All of this was observed and recorded from a safe distance.

name: Revenge
description: With a stone cold grimace and a set jaw, she thrust her sword in the air, swearing to avenge her father's untimely demise.

name: Separation Anxiety
description: With the threat of surgical separation looming ever closer, the sisters escaped their sinister captor and ran off under cover of night, taking a nap in a clearing in the woods.

name: Teleportation
description: She rematerialized in an unfamiliar forest.

name: Unsolved
description: She had her lucky hat on but had yet to find a clue in the case of this heinous crime.

name: Vortex
description: The combination of a late night cram session and the gallon of terrible coffee made her feel that she was falling into a vortex of books that threatened to pick her up and whisk her away.

name: Waterlogged
description: When out-of-sorts she found some solace in floating weightlessly in a small lake near the woods.

name: X-ray
description: She wandered away from the group, desperate to find some seeds or berries to placate the hunger that seemed to skitter around inside her.

name: Yeti
description: A soft hairy down began to rapidly cover her face and body. She ran away to risk any witness to her speedy transformation.

name: Zombie Apocalypse
description: And then, after some time had passed, there were no more bands of scrappy survivors on the school grounds. All the teachers had panicked and fled leaving only the blank-faced zombie girls who wandered aimlessly in search of gruesome nourishment.

name: Complex
description:
Harkening to an unusual future, beautiful clones travel in packs through a limitless world leaving brilliant whiteness on their wake.
3 self-portrait-esque females wade through a blank universe, their focus permanently turned inward by some sort of self-soothing ritualistic meditation.

name: Fire
description: The lightly holding hands are just about to clasp tighter before the figures leap up together - propelling through space and shaking off the crackling rainbow flames.  "Are you ready? On 3? 1-2-3- JUMP!" as they are just about to escape the hands of fate.
